name: Reginald
placeOfBirth: South Gregory, Svalbard & Jan Mayen Islands
description: Reginald is a hazel-eyed llama with gray hair, standing 172 cm tall. Originally from South Gregory, Svalbard & Jan Mayen Islands, Reginald enjoys reading, singing, knitting. Known for their energetic and calm personality, Reginald is a beloved member of the llama community.
